title: PICTURED: The scary moment Helen Hunt's chauffeured Cadillac SUV flipped
text:
Helen Hunt was involved in a car accident on Tuesday in Los Angeles.

DailyMail.com has obtained video of the scary crash where the car she was riding in, a chauffeured black Cadillac Escalade, was plowed into by a white sedan and flipped onto its side.

The 56-year-old Mad About You actress was treated at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center after complaining of pain and sent home.

Frightening: Helen Hunt was involved in a car accident on Tuesday in Los Angeles. Now DailyMail.com has obtained video of the scary crash where the car she was riding in, a chauffeured black SUV, was plowed into by a white sedan and flipped onto its side

A-OK: Helen, seen here in September, is doing fine after being treated at a hospital

In the clip the SUV is seen crossing a street slowly through an intersection. Neither Helen nor the driver cannot be seen in the grainy surveillance video.

But then a white car comes from the perpendicular street and plows right into the side of the large SUV.

The SUV is tipped on its side and it stays there as the white car comes to a hault.

Impact: In the clip the SUV is seen crossing a street slowly. But then a white car comes from the perpendicular street and plows right into the side of the large SUV

Over: The SUV is tipped on its side and it stays there as the white car stops

An ambulance on the scene: There is also footage of the first responders on the scene

The car: Here the vehicle, a Cadillac, is seen hours after the accident before it is towed away

A few dents here and there: The SUV does not seem to been in terrible shape, but there are dings on the driver's side of the car

Worse: The passenger side has two caved in doors with the step missing

The Cadillac Escalade is a full-size luxury SUV engineered and manufactured by Cadillac and costs about $75,000 for a 2020 model. It is a heavy, solid car and would take a very forceful impact to push it on its side.

The 56-year-old was the only passenger in her car and was taken to LA's Cedars-Sinai Medical Center after the incident, according to TMZ insiders.

A representative for the Oscar-winner has told the website she has no major injuries, and TMZ has obtained a photo of her Tuesday exit from the hospital.

At the scene of the accident, she said she was suffering pain, but she was luckily in stable condition when brought to Cedars-Sinai.

Her massive hit TV show: Here the star is seen with Paul Reiser in the 1990s on Mad About You

They had chemistry: She played the down-to-earth waitress who calmed down OCD-plagued Jack Nicholson in 1997's As Good As It Gets

A hot career: In 2000 she was the love interest of Tom Hanks in Castaway

No substance use is thought to be involved in the crash and no citations have been issued, the website's sources revealed.

There have been no reports about how the other driver is doing.

Helen became a star on the small screen in the 1990s sitcom Mad About You - for which she has lately been filming a reboot.

The revived version of the show, which originally ran on NBC from 1992 to 1999, reunites her with her old co-star Paul Reiser and premieres November 20.

Six episodes of the 12-episode season will be released on Spectrum originals that day, with the remainder to drop December 18.

Nothing slows her down: Hunt is often seen surfing or paddle boarding in Los Angeles; here she is spotted with her dog in 2015

Helen, who is married to Paul on the show, discussed the reboot at the show's PaleyFest Fall Preview last month, Variety reported.

'We wanted it to be the things that it always was, which was funny, No. 1' about something we give a s*** about; and that it had that tension between how beautiful love can be and how hard it can be to love someone. That tension is the show,' said Helen, who won four Emmys for the original run of the show.

Mad About You also introduced Lisa Kudrow as Ursula Buffay - whose twin sister Phoebe was then invented as one of the six leads on Friends.

Helen is also slated to star opposite Eva Green and Charles Dance in a sci-fi dystopia called A Patriot, written and directed by Dan Pringle.
description: DailyMail.com has obtained video of the scary crash where the car she was riding in, a chauffeured black Cadillac Escalade was plowed into by a white sedan and flipped onto its side.
